# https://www.acmicpc.net/problem/11047

import sys

N, K = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

prices = sorted(list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())))

total = 0
for i in range(K):
    total += prices[i]

print(total)

import sys

N, K = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())

prices = sorted(list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())))

total = 0
for i in range(K):
    total += prices[i]

print(total)

N, K = map(int, input().split())

fruit = list(map(int, input().split()))
fruit.sort()
print(sum(fruit[:K]))
